channel.title: Newsletter on SASIP
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on SASIP

item.title: Newsletter (test)
item.description: $('li.more > a').click(function(){ var toToggle = $($(this).attr('data-to-toggle')); if(toToggle.is(':visible')){ toToggle.slideUp('fast'); $(this).removeClass('is-active'); if ($('#awesomebar').find('.is-active').length < 1){ $('#awesomebar').removeClass('sub-active'); } } else { toToggle.slideDown('fast'); $(this).addClass('is-active'); $('#awesomebar').addClass('sub-active'); } return false; }); }); </script></body> </html>
